attributes.action: instruct the Envoiroment Agency to install a volunteer body of water bailiffs...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to instruct the Envoiroment Agency to install a volunteer body of water bailiffs.
Said bailiffs to be duly vetted for suitability by the Envoiroment Agency and answerable to the Envoiroment Agency.
To have equivalent powers as per current water bailiffs, overseen by the Envoiroment Agency.
Furthermore, legislation and bylaws governing the waterways, with regard to their use to be revised and updated and the accepted legislations to be rigourously enforced in law.
